visual.name: SankeyDiagramforPowerBICertifiedbyChartExpo
visual.displayName: Sankey Diagram for Power BI (certified) by ChartExpo
visual.description: A custom Sankey Diagram visual for Power BI that displays flows between categories. Useful for showing data movement, relationships, or conversions across stages. Supports customizable nodes, links, tooltips, filters, slicers and much more.

header.description: 1- Click in the following box and press CTR+A from your keyboard to select the link. 2- Press CTRL+C to copy the link Open your favorite browser and paste the copied link in the browser address bar and hit enter from the keyboard. 3- Provide the necessary information on ChartExpo Subscription page. License key would be emailed to you.

licenseLink.description: Click in the following box and press CTR+A from your keyboard to select the link. Press CTRL+C to copy the link Open your favorite browser and paste the copied link in the browser address bar. Hit enter from the keyboard. Provide the necessary information on ChartExpo Subscription page. License key would be emailed to you.
